articles.description: Premier League referee David Coote is suspended with immediate effect by refereeing body PGMOL.
articles.title: David Coote: Premier League referee suspended over alleged anti-Liverpool video.

articles.description: The broadcaster has hosted the corporation's flagship football show Match of the Day since 1999.
articles.title: Gary Lineker: BBC Match of the Day host to leave at end of season

articles.description: Aston Villa's Morgan Rogers is called up to England's squad for November’s Nations League internationals after eight players withdraw through injury.
articles.title: England: Morgan Rogers called into Three Lions squad as eight players withdraw through injury

articles.description: India has informed the International Cricket Council it will not travel to the Champions Trophy, according to hosts Pakistan.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: India will not travel to Pakistan, says PCB

articles.description: Ruud van Nistelrooy leaves Manchester United after not being given a role in new manager Ruben Amorim's backroom staff.
articles.title: Ruud van Nistelrooy: Dutchman exits Man Utd as new manager Ruben Amorim decides not to keep him in backroom staff

articles.description: A late blocked field goal sees the Kansas City Chiefs stay perfect at 9-0, while the Steelers and 49ers also win thrillers on Sunday.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 10 recap: Chiefs go 9-0, Lions & 49ers win with late field goal drama

articles.description: Manchester City defender Ruben Dias says the Premier League champions "embrace" the "challenge" posed by their losing streak.
articles.title: Man City: Ruben Dias 'embraces challenge' posed by champions' losing streak

articles.description: Casper Ruud stuns an out-of-sorts Carlos Alcaraz to begin his ATP Finals campaign with a straight-set victory in Turin.
articles.title: ATP Finals: Casper Ruud stuns Carlos Alcaraz in straight sets

articles.description: England's review of their last-gasp defeat by Australia was "brutal" but exactly what the squad needed, says wing Ollie Sleightholme.
articles.title: England review 'brutal' after Australia defeat - Ollie Sleightholme

articles.description: Bernhard Langer, 67, wins a title for the 18th year in a row on the PGA Tour Champions' circuit.
articles.title: Bernhard Langer extends PGA Tour Champions' record with season-ending victory
